CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: [8][9][10][11] In recent efforts to develop high performance conjugated polymers , building blocks have been carefully designed for the conjugated polymers to have adequate energy levels , broad light absorption and strong self - assembly for use in BHJ PSC.

Let's think step by step.

1. Conjugated polymers
2. Building blocks (for conjugated polymers)
3. BHJ PSC (Bulk Heterojunction Polymer Solar Cells)

These are the entities related to materials mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Conjugated polymers
2. Building blocks (for conjugated polymers)
3. BHJ PSC (Bulk Heterojunction Polymer Solar Cells)

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Conjugated polymers |
| Building blocks (for conjugated polymers) |
| BHJ PSC (Bulk Heterojunction Polymer Solar Cells) |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: [8][9][10][11] In recent efforts to develop high performance conjugated polymers , building blocks have been carefully designed for the conjugated polymers to have adequate energy levels , broad light absorption and strong self - assembly for use in BHJ PSC.

Let's think step by step.

1. High performance conjugated polymers
2. Energy levels
3. Broad light absorption
4. Strong self-assembly
5. BHJ PSC (Blends of High Performance Hole Transporting and Electron Transporting Materials in Polymer Solar Cells)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. High performance conjugated polymers: This is a type of material.
2. Energy levels: This refers to a material property, specifically the energy levels within a material.
3. Broad light absorption: This refers to a material property, specifically the ability of a material to absorb a wide range of light.
4. Strong self-assembly: This refers to a material property, specifically the ability of a material to assemble itself into a desired structure.

So, the relevant entities are: energy levels, broad light absorption, and strong self-assembly.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| energy levels |
| broad light absorption |
| strong self-assembly |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: [8][9][10][11] In recent efforts to develop high performance conjugated polymers , building blocks have been carefully designed for the conjugated polymers to have adequate energy levels , broad light absorption and strong self - assembly for use in BHJ PSC.

Let's think step by step.

1. High performance conjugated polymers
2. Adequate energy levels
3. Broad light absorption
4. Strong self-assembly

These entities can be considered as "Property Values" because they describe specific desirable characteristics or qualities of the conjugated polymers being developed.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. Adequate energy levels
2. Broad light absorption
3. Strong self-assembly

These entities are the only ones that clearly refer to the values of material properties being sought after in the development of high performance conjugated polymers.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Adequate energy levels |
| Broad light absorption |
| Strong self-assembly |
